info.title: Repository Service for TUF API
info.description: Repository Service for TUF Rest API

get.summary: Check the bootstrap status. Scope: read:bootstrap
get.description: Check if the bootstrap of the system is done or not.

post.summary: Bootstrap the system with initial signed Metadata. Scope: write:bootstrap
post.description: Initialize the TUF Repository with initial signed Metadata and Settings.
Rotate a role metadata that requires offline signing.

post.summary: Add targets files to Metadata. Scope: write:targets

delete.summary: Remove targets files from Metadata. Scope: delete:targets

post.summary: Submit a task to publish targets.Scope: write:targets
post.description: Trigger a task to publish targets not yet published from the RSTUF Database

get.description: Get Repository Metadata task state. The state is according with Celery tasks: `PENDING` the task still not processed or unknown/inexistent task. `RECEIVED` task is reveived by the broker server. `PRE_RUN` the task will start by repository-service-tuf-worker. `RUNNING` the task is in execution. `FAILURE` the task failed to executed. `SUCCESS` the task execution is finished.
Return the token details. It requires an authenticated token with scope authorization.

post.description: Issue a token with scopes for all granted user scope.

post.summary: Issue token from authenticated token. Scope: write:token
post.description: Issue token from a valid and existent token.

add_task_id_to_custom.title: Add Task Id To Custom
add_task_id_to_custom.description: Whether to add the id of the task in custom

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Add scopes separeted by space. Available scopes: `read:bootstrap`, `read:settings`, `read:tasks`, `read:token`, `write:bootstrap`, `write:metadata`, `write:targets`, `write:token`, `delete:targets`

publish_targets.title: Publish Targets
publish_targets.description: Whether to publish the targets changes
